title: Executive Order 5080-Transferring Certain Described Lands from the Missoula National Forest to the Helena Missoula National Forest, Montana
content: Under authority of the Act of Congress approved June 4, 1897 (30 Stat. 34, 36), and on the recommendation of the Secretary of Agriculture, it is hereby ordered that the following described lands be transferred from the Missoula National Forest, in the State of Montana, and be made a part of the Helena National Forest in the same State, to be hereafter administered subject to the laws and regulations relating to the Helena National Forest:
In Township 15 North, Range 6 West, Sections 21, 22, 23, 24, 25, 26 and 27.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5080-Transferring Certain Described Lands from the Missoula National Forest to the Helena Missoula National Forest, Montana Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/360796
